category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_escalation_mgmt_start_time
preference.preference_description: Indicates the start time (to create first dispatcher request) in days for Reminder and Escalation Management. If the value is 0, dispatcher requests are executed immediately. If the value is n (greater than 0), dispatcher requests are executed on nth day.
